articles.title: WHO Urges Immediate Action Amid Cholera Vaccine Shortage - Voice of America - VOA News
articles.description: Investment in clean water and health care is urged
articles.content:
The World Health Organization on Wednesday called for immediate action to combat a worldwide spike in cholera cases amid a global vaccine shortage.

articles.title: Caitlin Clark, freshmen JuJu Watkins and Hannah Hidalgo top AP women's All-America team - The Associated Press
articles.description: Iowa star Caitlin Clark has been honored for the third straight season as a first-team Associated Press All-American. She is just the 11th player to earn that distinction three times. The NCAA's all-time leading scorer was joined by Stanford’s Cameron Brink, …
articles.content:
Caitlin Clark has been a mainstay on The Associated Press All-America team the past few seasons.
